mapper.select: select id, description, rate, shop_id as shopId, user_id as userId, date_updated as dateUpdated from reviews where is_deleted = false
select id, description, rate, shop_id as shopId, user_id as userId, date_updated as dateUpdated from reviews where shop_id = #{shopId} and is_deleted = false
select id, description, rate, shop_id as shopId, user_id as userId, date_updated as dateUpdated from reviews where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = false
select rate from reviews where shop_id = #{shopId} and is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into reviews (id, description, rate, shop_id, user_id) values (#{id}, #{item.description}, #{item.rate}, #{item.shopId}, #{item.userId})
mapper.update: update reviews set description = #{description}, rate = #{rate}, shop_id = #{shopId}, user_id = #{userId}, date_updated = now() where id = #{id}
update reviews set is_deleted = true, date_updated = now() where id = #{id}
